name: Celestial Links
description:
The orange star must hit the red target to advance to the next level. To achieve this, release the blue and orange stars by selecting them.

If on desktop: release by left clicking the stars.

If on mobile: release by tapping the stars.

Source code not available as it is pretty messy. If you have any questions about how to make a similar game, please ask and I am happy to help! :)
